title: HOUR 1 - Dana White, Tom Brady, Albert Breer
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Dana White, Tom Brady, Albert Breer
description:
In hour 1, Colin says Tom Brady dodged a bullet with the Raiders as Dana White tells a story about a previous deal that didn't work. Kenny Pickett is the future of the Pittsburgh Steelers, that future needs to start Week 1. Albert Breer joins to talk Tom Brady, Joe Burrow and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
